title: IT Solutions Architect
description:
**Welcome to Eficode!**
 We are building the future of software development - specializing in Cloud, DevOps, Agile, and Development. We help our customers transform into software-driven organizations, aiming to change the world by sharing our knowledge. Our employees value: opportunities for growth, psychological safety and culture - we appreciate our laid-back and autonomous, but supportive atmosphere.
   

**We’re on the lookout for an IT Solutions Architect**
 Eficode is looking for an experienced IT Solutions Architect. This is a new role and you will be key in creating and applying a unified and scalable IT structure throughout our entire business. This includes working closely with Eficode’s ERP, HRM, and financial platforms. We're searching for someone who has a solid track record of setting up comprehensive global IT solutions that make our internal operations smoother and more connected.
   

**Your Role And Responsibilities**
 As our new IT Solutions Architect, you'll play a crucial role in designing and setting up the core systems that strengthen our global consultancy business. This involves crafting and executing a comprehensive strategy for integrating many systems into a unified IT framework. Your responsibilities will include:
   

* Developing and Implementing a Global IT Architecture: Design and implement a master plan for integrating country-specific systems into a single, cohesive architecture, ensuring seamless operations and information flow.
* Leading Technical Integrations: Oversee the technical integration of Eficode’s ERP, HRM, and Financial systems, utilizing your expertise to build a robust, unified toolset that supports our global ambitions.
* Implementing Technological Solutions: Identify, develop, and implement modern solutions that enhance operational efficiency and drive strategic business objectives.
* Hands-on System Development: Actively participate in the configuration, deployment and customization of IT systems to ensure optimal performance and scalability.
* Technical Advising and Collaboration: Serve as a technical advisor within the organization, promoting best practices in IT development and fostering collaboration across teams to achieve a unified IT architecture vision.
* Aligning IT with Business Goals: Ensure IT strategies and solutions are in perfect alignment with business objectives, facilitating growth and operational excellence.


**Who are we looking for?**
 Our new IT Solutions Architect will lead the technical implementation and strategy of our IT architecture to scale Eficode globally. We seek an innovative and experienced professional to own our IT landscape, focusing on HR and financial system integration and optimization. This role involves understanding business needs, driving the strategic direction of our IT infrastructure, and implementing scalable solutions to support global expansion and operational excellence. The ideal candidate will combine technical expertise, strategic vision, and hands-on skills to build the future of our IT systems.
   

**Our Ideal IT Solutions Architect Is Someone Who Has**
* Hands-on experience in IT integration projects and building globally scalable platforms (particularly in HR and financial systems).
* System administration: you are experienced in managing servers based on Linux, Windows, or in the cloud with AWS, Azure, or OpenStack.
* Experience with API design, development, and integration for HR and financial systems, including proficiency in RESTful and SOAP APIs, API gateways, and data security practices.
* Exceptional problem-solving skills and the ability to conceptualize complex IT solutions.
* Solid leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with proven experience of working effectively across diverse teams and cultures.
* Shares our continuous learning and knowledge-sharing culture.


**It’s Advantageous If You Have**
* Proficiency in the Atlassian stack, Netsuite, Salesforce, and HRM platforms, with a keen understanding of how to leverage these tools in a global architectural framework.
* Automation: you may have set up, built, and deployed systems using Azure DevOps, Jenkins, GitLab CI, ArgoCD, or equivalent.
* Version control: you may be skilled in handling source code in Git, using, for instance, GitLab and GitHub with artifacts in Nexus or Artifactory.
* Experience in working within a consultancy business.


**Why Choose Eficode?**
* You’ll have the opportunity to contribute and participate in an exciting international growth story.
* Eficode is a hub of bright minds working on groundbreaking projects.
* We provide an environment that respects experience, nurtures talent, and encourages growth.
* Open collaboration and clear communication are the cornerstones of our culture.
* With our commitment to personal development, your growth never stops.
* Flexible Work: Tailor your work environment and schedule to fit your life best, with remote work options available globally.
* On top of your compensation, we offer fringe benefits that depend on your location.
* Possibility to explore life in another country through our international presence.


**Join Us!**
 If you're ready to lead in the creation of an innovative IT architecture and want to make a significant impact in a growing international organization, Eficode is where you belong.
   

 This is a full-time, hybrid remote role available in
 **Finland, Sweden, Denmark, Poland or the UK** 
 (please note that we hope you are already located in one these countries)
   

 This role is a global position and some traveling may be required. If this opportunity sparks your interest, please apply
 **by 01.07.24** 
 , we would love to hear from you!

title: Senior Azure Cloud Architect
description:
Join Nordcloud and make your mark on the European IT industry. Help our clients thrive on their cloud journey in solution areas such as infrastructure, migration, data, and security.
   

  

**Currently, we are looking for a Senior Azure Cloud Architect for our team in Sweden.**
**Your** 
**daily responsibilities:**
* Participating in various customer projects, from implementing cloud foundations and platforms to transforming workloads into cloud native application
* Pre-sales activity including assisting with writing customer proposal
* Deep-diving into our customers' challenges by giving workshops and designing recommendations to technical teams and stakeholders
* You will become a trusted advisor for high-profile enterprises and jointly manage the customer relationship and roadmap with the Nordcloud account team
* You will have the opportunity to engage with our customers from the very start of the customer journey to the cloud and continue in your role on the customer projects until it’s finished
* Acting as technical thought leader in customer engagements and amongst your peers at Nordcloud
* Occasional travelling in Sweden or Europe may be an option, depending on the assignment and your preferences


****Your key skills:****
* Hands-on experience with Cloud Architecture Design and/or Cloud Architectural Patterns for Development
* At least 5 years of experience in Public Cloud
* Advanced knowledge and hands-on experience with Azure (other public clouds such as AWS and GCP are a plus)
* Experience in leading complex large-scale projects
* Solid engineering/technical background/hands-on experience with conceptualizing, strategizing, and architecting cloud solutions
* Knowledge of security, network, virtualization, load balancer, storage, and database
* Hands-on experience with IaC (Infrastructure-as-Code) for managing the cloud
* Knowledge and experience around DevOps/DevSecOps and/or Platform Engineering as well as the ability to share, coach and mentor in these areas
* Active customer consultant and pre-sales attitude are a must
* Experience with enterprise customers or big organizations
* At least 3 years of experience working within the EU
* Fluent communication skills in both English and Swedish


**What sets you apart (we’d consider any of these as a big plus):**
* Windows and/or Linux sys op background
* Previous experience in the design and delivery of systems based on IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS offerings, as well as exposure to different architecture models
* Passion to share your knowledge, mentor others in the team and lead if necessary
* Experience with building CI/CD pipelines
* Coding/scripting skills (Bash, Python, Powershell, or similar)
* Experience in consultancy


 All in all, you should have a solid engineering/technical background/hands-on experience with conceptualizing, strategizing and architecting cloud solutions. As you will work directly with customers, social skills and a customer service attitude are a must. We favor critical/logical thinking, curiosity, and attention to detail over extensive but unstructured knowledge.
   

  

 We encourage you to
 **apply** 
 , even if you don’t meet all of the requirements. We value your growth potential and enthusiasm!
   

  

**What do we offer in return?**
* Individual training budget and exam fees for partner certifications
* Flexible working hours and hybrid working model
* Laptop and equipment of your choice
* Local package such as six weeks of vacation, a pension package, private health care through EuroAccident, wellness benefits (Friskvårdsbidrag), and you can also pick more benefits from benify.se
* We are part of the collective bargaining agreement (Almegas Kollektivavtal - Tech Sverige)


 Please read our Recruitment Privacy Policy before applying.
 **All applicants must have the right to work in Sweden.**
**About Nordcloud**
 Nordcloud, an IBM company, is a European leader in cloud advisory, implementation, application development, managed services, and training. We are triple-certified across Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud and Amazon Web Services, and we are recognized as a 'Visionary' by Gartner for Public Cloud IT Services. With 10 European hubs and over 1300 employees, we are known for our innovative cloud-native solutions and we have delivered over 1000 successful cloud projects.
   

  

 Learn more at nordcloud.com and follow the #NordcloudCommunity.
   

  

*Nordcloud values diversity and is dedicated to providing equal opportunities for all candidates and employees.*

description:

title: Product Owner
description:
**Role:**  

In this role, you would be managing the infrastructure team working with Azure technologies supporting Teamcenter PLM application and the related technical details securing good performance, security and infrastructure architecture for the solutions. You would even be responsible for the CI/CD practices and tools within the program.  

  

You would act as Product Owner for the infrastructure team, prioritizing their backlog and securing the right needs and demands from the other teams (application, migration etc) within the program are understood and readily communicated within the team to deliver right from start at right time.

**Essential requirements:**

  

* Prioritize technical activities around Teamcenter PLM
* Lead the Teamcenter environment management activities

title: Enterprise Solutions Engineer, Nordics
description:
### **Who We Are**


Verkada is the largest cloud-based B2B physical security platform company in the world. Only Verkada offers six product lines — video security cameras, access control, environmental sensors, alarms, workplace and intercoms — integrated with a single cloud-based software platform.

Designed with simplicity and scalability in mind, Verkada gives organizations the real-time insight to know what could impact the safety and comfort of people throughout their physical environment, while empowering them to take immediate action to minimize security risks, workplace frustrations and costly inefficiencies.

Founded in 2016 with more than $460M in funding raised to date, Verkada has expanded rapidly with 16 offices across three continents, 1,700+ full-time employees and 20,000+ customers across 70+ countries.

Verkada is seeking an Enterprise Field Solutions Engineer based in the Nordics with expert experience in Cloud Security, IoT Systems, Networking, Linux systems, Security Surveillance and Access Control. This individual will partner directly with their territory account executives to expand the Verkada footprint upmarket into Fortune 500 companies. Responsibilities include directly interfacing with customers/partners throughout the sales process, overcoming technical objections, assisting customers in designing deployments with Verkada Products and providing technical assistance to territory account reps. The ideal candidate will be highly motivated, able to learn quickly and work independently while making impactful results for the company remotely.


### **Responsibilities**


* Be the subject matter authority on the full Verkada suite of products and offerings and articulate the value added benefits to customers throughout the sales process.
* Act as a trusted advisor for Verkada Customers and overcome objections while securing the technical win for Verkada.
* Effectively present the Verkada solution to all levels of customer, from C-level executives to loss prevention managers and directors of IT.
* Work directly with your Account Managers to develop territory strategy for Verkada.
* Design Verkada solutions that range from: Network Security recommendations/bandwidth requirements, choosing proper Verkada products for Physical Security and deployment. Cloud Security RFP's/Documents, LTE deployments.
* Stay up to date on the security and IoT industry by attending and presenting at strategic conferences and providing thought leadership within the market
* Be a Product Technical Evangelist in training/educating partners, customers, and internal employees on the latest Verkada product offerings.
* Write White Papers and Knowledge Base articles about Verkada Products, features, and integrations.
* 25% Travel may be required

### **Requirements**


* 5+ years of experience as a Sales Engineer, with a proven track record of working with Fortune 500 companies.
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology, Information and Computer Technology, Networking, IT Security from an accredited university.
* A Strong background in Networking: Experience with HTTPS/SSL, VLANs, TCP/IP, DNS, NAT devices, DHCP servers, Firewalls and software systems.
* Outstanding written and verbal English communication skills in order to clearly and efficiently articulate technical matters with customers and partners.
* Industry certifications (ideally): AWS, CCNA, CCDA, CCNP, MCSE, CEH, Security+, A+, Network+, Microsoft Azure, CISSP, CSP.
* Experience working with API's, Python, and other coding languages and although not essential is a plus.
* Experience working with Linux systems (ideal not a requirement).
* Previous startup experience (ideal not a requirement).
* Must live in Norway, Sweden, Denmark, or Finland.

  




### **Verkada Is An Equal Opportunity Employer**



As an equal opportunity employer, Verkada is committed to providing employment opportunities to all individuals. All applicants for positions at Verkada will be treated without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, sex, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy, or any other basis prohibited by applicable law.

title: Support & System administration
description:
We are looking for an IT servicedesk person with a great service mindset who wants to be part of a global company at our headquarters in Malmö. If you are looking for your next opportunity within IT-support, then this could be the position for you!


**The role**  

In the role as System & Support Administrator you’ll support the organization with technical support. You will handle different IT-related issues that will come from your your colleagues all around the organization. The cases can come through the ticket system or from other communication channels such as teams, email or someone coming up to you at the office. You will be a part of a team at the Headquarters in Malmö who help and support each other but you are expected to work independently and take ownership of your cases from start to finish.



Your responsibilities include, but are not limited to:


* Help and support the users with different technical issues both hardware and software related, mainly Windows related applications
* Install new hardware
* Work preventively with recurrent issues and develop your way of working.


**Who are you?**

For this role you need to be very communicative and provide excellent service to your colleagues. You are detailed oriented, curious and a fast learner. You take great responsibility for your cases and you like to dig into different problems and solve them.


* A number of years competence and experience from previous position in IT support, helping users both onsite and via remote controlling tools
* Good communicator and service minded
* Flexible and a fast learner in a complex IT landscape
* Active Directory user administration
* User administration in various cloud based systems
* Good Windows and MS Office administrative skills
* Some hardware knowledge
* Ideally Apple MacOS knowledge, but not a firm requirement


We are looking for you who have a couple of years of experience of similar working tasks. You are used to working with computers and systems, especially Active Directory and Office. As a person you have a big interest in IT generally and have a basic understanding of both hardware and software installation.



We are a global company and have English as our corporate language and fluent English is a requirement. If you also speak Swedish, it is advantageous but not a requirement.


**Why Duni Group?**

We offer you the opportunity to work in an international company where sustainability is high on the agenda. You get to work together with passionate colleagues and through our commitment, we help each other reach our goals. We believe in your infinite potential and ability to develop. Through your curiosity and courage you will get the opportunity to make a difference.


**Further information and application**

We would love to know more about you and your motivation for this job! Please send us your application, CV and cover letter, in English by June 23th. If you have any questions regarding the position, please contact People & Culture Specialist Annie Holst at annie.holst@duni.com.



Please note that we will be working with a continuous selection process, which means that we may close the application process earlier than stated if we find the right candidates. So, don’t delay, please send us your application today.



Start: As soon as possible, with regards of the notice period.


**About Duni Group**

Duni Group is a market leader in sustainable dining and food packaging solutions for the restaurant market. The Group markets and sells its products under primarily the brands Duni, BioPak and Paper+Design, which are represented in more than 40 markets. Duni Group has around 2,400 employees in 22 countries, its headquarters in Malmö and production units in Sweden, Germany, Poland, New Zealand and Thailand. Duni Group is listed on NASDAQ Stockholm under the ticker “DUNI”. Its ISIN code is SE0000616716.



If you have not already gotten a good feeling for who we are, go to our website www.dunigroup.com. Here you can read more about who we are and what we are passionate about. Hopefully you want to be part of our team!


**Duni Group is a Career Company**



Duni Group has been recognized as one of Sweden’s top 100 employers for the fourth year in a row. The recognition comes from Karriärföretagen (Career Company), an organization that has been presenting Sweden’s most attractive employers since 2011. Companies go through a selection process by an expert panel and a qualified jury, to be named a Career Company by Karriärföretagen.



Duni Group has been recognized for creating a joyful and passionate workplace, offering our employees opportunities to grow personally and professionally. We've also been acknowledged for our strong focus on innovation and sustainability.

title: Data Scientist
description:
**Job ID:** 242556


**Date posted:** 10/06/2024


**Who you are**  

  

We are looking for a Data Scientist to join us in developing ways for IKEA to stay relevant for our customers. We are using data and analytics within cross-functional teams, to create value all along our customer’s journey.  

  

Our diverse Data & Analytics team in Customer Engagement is growing and we would love to talk with you, if you recognize yourself in some of the following:  

  

* passionate about understanding a business problem and applying Data & Analytics to try and solve

them  

* have experience in developing data and statistics-driven solutions for real-life business problems
* exhibit the ability to clearly communicate statistical and machine learning concepts to non-technical

stakeholders, ensuring a shared understanding of the models' impact and operational requirements.  

* demonstrate proficiency in deploying and maintaining robust machine learning models in production

environments, ensuring their performance and reliability.  

* master techniques for Data Science and can choose relevant algorithms fit for purpose, such as

gradient boosting, Bayesian modelling, deep learning, natural language processing, time-series
  

analysis or optimization/OR techniques  

* have experience leading the development of advanced analytics frameworks within large

organizations  

* are a team player who takes ownership, builds cross-functional relationships with senior peers and

loves sharing knowledge with other Data Scientists and coworkers  

* are curious, self-directed and want to keep learning!

  

This is our wish list! If you don’t recognize yourself in all these points, you might still be an excellent candidate for the role. We like to think long-term and invest in people’s development together with us.  

  

The IKEA culture and values are very much a part of our business and day to day work life. For you to thrive and grow with IKEA it’s important for us that you share our values! You can read more regarding our values and life at IKEA on our website www.ikea.com.  

  

**What you'll be doing day to day**  

  

IKEA is taking huge steps in its digital transformation and our Data & Analytics Customer team is at the forefront of building intelligent systems for data-driven business decisions. For example, within Customer Engagement we are developing models and tools to answer questions like:  

  

* How do we best encourage our customers to log-in to have a more seamless journey on the web and

app?
  

* How can we ensure that we send the most relevant content at the right time to our customers?

  

**Our team within Ikea**  

  

You will work in Data & Analytics together with other Data Analysts, Data Scientists and Data Engineers. Together you will be joining cross-functional teams consisting of colleagues from Technology, Product and Design, that design, implement and deploy products that help to solve these kinds of problems. It will be a mix of product insights, data visualization and writing code – as well as talking with product owners and business stakeholders.  

  

IKEA has long been a global leader in home furnishing. We are proud of our vision to improve the everyday life of the many people. But our industry is quickly changing and we need to adapt to stay competitive.  

  

As part of IKEA’s journey to strengthen our digital capabilities, we are building a Data & Analytics function. This team is working on problems across the company, ranging from customer modeling, loyalty, customer communication and more.  

We see so many opportunities for what we can accomplish and have the ambition to be a world-class team. At the same time, we believe that our work is not just about building models, but also about learning and having fun together.  

  

We can offer you:  

  

* Work on some very interesting problems as described above, and you are encouraged to spot new

opportunities or to collaborate with Data Science colleagues in other specialist teams.  

* Opportunities to have global impact with your work.
* Flexible and modern tools: we deploy on Google Cloud Platform and we use a lot of open-source tools

across the board.  

* Hardware and OS of your choice.
* A team of great colleagues to learn with and from (with world-class experience across all aspects of

Data Science).  

* Continuous learning (we aim to spend 20% of our working time on learning).
* Flexible and friendly working environment.
* Relocation support (If Senior) if not already in the area: we are based in southern Sweden,

Amsterdam in the Netherlands, and in Madrid, Spain.  

  

**Questions and support? Let's connect!**  

  

Does this sound like your next challenge? IKEA offers an exciting and empowering work environment in a global workplace. And as the world’s leader at life at home, you have exceptional opportunities to grow and develop together with us.  

  

If you have questions regarding the recruitment system, please reach out to Annette Björkquist-Åhstedt at annette.bjorkquist-ahstedt@ingka.ikea.com. Please apply with your application in English. Note that we can’t process any applications through email.  

  

As you might know, in Sweden it’s common to take a few weeks of holiday during July, most people take over multiple weeks in a row; at IKEA we are no different. We believe in a healthy work-life balance and encourage our co-workers to take time to relax, recharge, and unwind. Because of this great benefit, we might take a bit longer to get back to you, we will return in August, and you should hear from us as soon as possible.  

  

We look forward to learning more about you!  

  

Thank you!
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Manufacturing Systems Integration Engineer – MES
description:
One foot on the floor, the other in the cloud(s)?
  
  

Are you a Software Engineer comfortable in straddling the space between equipment and cloud?
  
We’re now looking for a Manufacturing Systems Integration Engineer to develop and implement a cutting-edge MES solution that will be the backbone of battery cell production at our Gigafactory in Torslanda.
  
  

Note; With summer holidays coming up, we will try to handle the applications as soon as we can, but you might expect feedback after summer.
  
  

NOVO Energy
  
  

NOVO Energy is a Northvolt Volvo Cars joint venture formed to power the next generation of pure electric Volvo and Polestar cars. We are building a state-of-the-art facility for research and development of the next generation of battery cells. By joining NOVO Energy, you get a unique opportunity to prepare for the electrification of automotive whilst contributing to a climate-neutral way of life for future generations.
  
  

The opportunity (and challenge)
  
  

Battery manufacturing is a tech-lovers dream. An environment filled with specialized equipment, high-level engineering solutions, cutting-edge technology and incredibly people working together. Connecting it all is our Manufacturing Execution System (MES). Based on a Northvolt concept, this cloud-first solution will be the key to monitor and optimize our battery production from start-to-end.
  
And we need you to help us build it.
  
  

Manufacturing Systems Integration Engineer
  
  

Working alongside a committed team and in close collaboration with our partners at Northvolt, you will influence this critical project at every level throughout its entire lifecycle. From design and implementation all the way to ongoing improvements in the production environment.
  
Responsible for system setup, equipment integration design, configuration, deployment, testing and validation, this is a rare opportunity for a driven software engineer looking to test their skills and build smart-factory solutions for the future.
  
  

* System and integration design.
* Deploy and configure MES functionality according to detailed technical design.
* Review, test and validate supplier connectivity implementation and digitalization product functionality.
* Integrate MES functionality with the equipment.
* Prepare and support in supplier workshops.
* Support & lead technical solution design for equipment integration projects.
* Collaborate with the MES development engineers, platform engineers and equipment suppliers.
* Factory support connected to MES system.
* Frequent travel to Stockholm to work with our partners in the Northvolt team.


What you’ll bring to the table
  
  

We believe you are a strong team player who enjoys working with cross-functional teams and external parties to invent and problem solve. You’re purpose driven and understand that the mission is to establish a Gigafactory where the time plan is tight, and collaboration is key. You bring well-developed technical skills, problem solving abilities and you’re comfortable in finding ways to move forward under ambiguous circumstances.
  
You're reliable reliable and structured and prde yourself in delivering high-quality work and looking after those around you.
  
  

Your background includes;
  
  

* BSc or MSc in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Mechatronics - or equivalent experience gained from work.
* Experience as a software engineer, preferably in a forward-deployed or integration-focused role involving manufacturing equipment or embedded software.
* Knowledge of algorithms, data structures, concurrency, distributed systems, and eventual consistency.
* Proficiency in Golang, Python, Java, C++ and experience with software development frameworks.
* Experience working with cloud solutions e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP etc.
* Bonus points for specific skills in Git, Kubernetes, Micro services, and AWS cloud tools.


Why join us?
  
  

As an Engineer, we can promise you highly interesting work pushing the boundaries of manufacturing technologies.
  
As a human we promise an excellent team environment with mature minded and kind people.
  
Our rapidly growing IT & Software is a highly collaborative group working together to solve interesting problems. Together we innovate, reinvent, and learn quickly to develop the technology required to run a world class Gigafactory.
  
Currently in a scale-up phase, this is an outstanding opportunity for you to make an outsized impact, contribute to our shared success and to grow your role, remit and career together with us.
  
  

Volvo Cars is one of the most well-known and respected car brands in the world. Northvolt is a leading supplier of sustainable, high-quality battery cells and systems, dedicated to delivering the world’s greenest lithium-ion battery. Together, we have formed a joint venture, NOVO Energy, to power the next generation of pure electric Volvo and Polestar cars.
  
  

Our Gigafactory in Gothenburg will be one of the largest cell production facilities in Europe, with a potential annual cell production capacity of up to 50 gigawatt hours (GWh) - thereby enabling a supply of batteries for approximately half a million Volvo and Polestar cars per year. Our state-of-the-art R&D facility will gather leading expertise from all over the world, to create the next generation battery cells.
  
  

You can read more about this joint venture in these press releases, here and here.

title: Senior Nätverkskonsult till Telia Cygate
description:
Är du redo för en ny möjlighet och vill utvecklas inom Nätverk? Vill du hjälpa våra kunder med deras stora och spännande nätverk samtidigt som du får möjlighet att fokusera på din personliga utveckling? Då kan detta vara din nästa möjlighet!  



Mitt namn är Karin Lantz och jag arbetar som Konsultchef i Växjö . Vi växer och söker en ny kollega som vill axla rollen som Senior Nätverkskonsult hos oss! Vill du vara med på vår resa där vi tillsammans hjälper våra kunder mot en digital infrastruktur? Ta då chansen och bli en del av oss!  

  



**Är det här din nästa möjlighet?**

  

Som Senior Nätverkskonsult får du arbeta högt som lågt med planering och design av olika nätverks- och säkerhetslösningar till installation, konfiguration och felsökning i våra riktigt stora kunders IT-miljöer.  

  



Våra kund- och leveransprojekt spänner ofta över flera tjänsteområden. Det innebär att du kommer få arbeta nära andra specialister inom våra tre fokusområden, nätverk, säkerhet och hybrid IT. Här kan du få djupare insikt och ny inspiration i allt från Cloud, Security och on- prem , och de senaste kombinationerna där emellan. Om du på sikt vill certifiera dig inom fler områden så stödjer vi det och vill att du ska utvecklas.  



**Är det här du?**

  

Som person motiveras du av att skapa förändring och har en förmåga att engagera kunder såväl som dina kollegor. Du kommer särskilt till din rätt när du får ge utlopp för tankar och idéer där du använder din verksamhetsförståelse för att omsätta krav till genomförbara lösningar. Förutom det får du tillhöra en växande organisation som uppmuntrar dig på din egen utvecklingsresa .  



Dina erfarenheter:


* Flera års relevant arbetserfarenhet inom Nätverk
* Erfarenhet inom SD-wan
* Arbetat med Cisco, Fortinet eller Check Point
Flytande svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift  
* 
**Telia Cygate är mer än bara en arbetsplats!**

  

Telia Cygate har länge varit kända som en IT-partner med nätverk och säkerhet i sitt DNA. Sedan 2006 är vi en del av Telia Company, vilket ger oss en stabil grund att stå på för att hjälpa våra kunder att utforska möjligheterna med digitalisering och molntjänster på ett tryggt sätt.


Det handlar inte bara om vad vi gör, utan minst lika mycket om hur vi gör det. Vi tar med oss kompetens och glädje till alla möten, för vi vet att det är idéerna och mångfalden som bidrar till de mest hållbara lösningarna. Tillsammans gör vi det enkelt och roligt att vara människa i teknikens värld.  



**Intresserad?**

Vi lovar att du kommer att börja en spännande resa hos oss samtidigt som du har mycket roligt på vägen. Placeringsort är Växjö .  



Annonsen kommer att vara publicerad under sommaren. Vi tillämpar ett löpande urval och rollen kan därför komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Sista ansökningsdag är **2024-08-15**  



Om du har några frågor gällande den här specifika tjänsten så får du gärna kontakta mig Karin Lantz på karin.lantz@cygate.se  

  



Bakgrundskontroll är en del i vår rekryteringsprocess. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!  

  



**Välkommen** **till Telia Cygate – Home of Experts**

title: Intern -Software Engineering for Process Automation - Prague

This offer and any related claims are subject to the successful completion of a pre-employment screening. This will involve employment, education, and criminal verification if applicable.*  

#LI-AY2 #LI-HYBRID
Who are we?:

HERE Technologies is a location data and technology platform company. We empower our customers to achieve better outcomes – from helping a city manage its infrastructure or a business optimize its assets to guiding drivers to their destination safely.  

At HERE we take it upon ourselves to be the change we wish to see. We create solutions that fuel innovation, provide opportunity and foster inclusion to improve people’s lives. title: Senior Säkerhetskonsult till Telia Cygate
description:
Telia Cygate i Region Öst växer och nu söker fler medarbetare som har vilja och engagemang att utvecklas tillsammans med oss.
  

  

Våra konsulter och tjänster är mycket efterfrågande, och vi utmärker oss bland annat genom att inneha högsta certifieringsnivå (CCSM-E), inom Check Point, Cisco-certifierade konsulter på CCIE-nivå, samt certifierade IT-Arkitekter inom ett brett segment.


Jag heter Daniel och leder en grupp av konsulter inom säkerhet på Telia Cygate i Region Öst. Vi utökar nu vårt team med ytterligare spetskompetens inom säkerhetsområdet och behöver ytterligare förstärkning för att tillgodose våra befintliga och blivande kunder.


**Din nästa utmaning?**

Som Säkerhetskonsult, kommer du att arbeta nära dina kollegor i implementationsprojekt med installation, design, migrering, konfiguration och felsökning av olika säkerhetslösningar. Vi arbetar med lösningar inom de ledande produkterna inom sitt segment, och hjälper våra kunder med planering, framtidssäkring samt drift och underhåll av deras IT-miljöer.


När vi arbetar med kund sträcker sig leveransen ofta över flera tjänsteområden, vilket innebär att du inte enbart kommer arbeta nära ditt eget team, utan även våra andra specialister inom nätverk, säkerhet och Hybrid IT. På så sätt utvecklas du och får bredare kunskaper, som nät- och säkerhetsdrift, Cloud, automation, virtualisering och datacenter. Om du på sikt vill certifiera dig inom ett eller flera områden så är det något vi stödjer och uppmuntrar.


**Vem är du?**  

Som person uppvisar du ett genuint intresse för att arbeta med kunder och hjälpa dem med deras tekniska utmaningar.
  

Du älskar att stå framför en grupp av både tekniker och ansvariga inom IT/Teknik och förklara våra lösningar och har lätt för att skapa förtroende och relationer, som i sin tur ger ett sug efter våra produkter, tjänster och erbjudanden.
  

  

Vi tror att du söker dig till oss för att du vill känna tillhörighet i ett team, framför att arbeta själv. Du har tidigare erfarenhet av hantering av säkerhetslösningar med fokus på produkter/tekniker från produkterna enligt nedan samt deras tilläggsprodukter.


**Dina erfarenheter:**

* Installation, design, konfiguration och felsökning av:
	+ Checkpoint
	+ Fortinet
	+ InfoBlox
	+ DDOS / Radware
	+ Bluecoat
	+ Zero Touch lösningar
	Tufin  
	+

**Du behöver även ha god erfarenhet av:**

* DHCP, DNS, TCP/IP, 802.1q (VLAN), routingprotokoll
* Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.
* Certifieringar ser vi som meriterande

**Home of Experts**

Telia Cygate har länge varit kända som en IT-partner som har nätverk och säkerhet i sitt DNA. Sedan 2006 är vi en del av Telia Company, vilket ger oss en stabil grund att stå på för att hjälpa våra kunder att utforska möjligheterna med digitalisering och molntjänster på ett tryggt sätt. Men det handlar inte bara om vad vi gör, utan minst lika mycket om hur vi gör det: Med ett leende och alltid med kundens bästa för ögonen. Vi tar med oss kompetens och glädje till alla möten, för vi vet att det är idéerna och mångfalden som bidrar till de mest hållbara lösningarna. Tillsammans gör vi det enkelt och roligt att vara människa i teknikens värld.


**Intresserad?**  

Sök tjänsten! Vi lovar att du kommer att börja en spännande resa hos oss samtidigt som du har mycket roligt på vägen. Placeringsort är: Stockholm - Solna med omnejd


Om du har några frågor gällande den här specifika tjänsten så får du gärna kontakta mig Daniel Westergård på daniel.westergard@cygate.se , alternativt via LinkedIn. Rekryteringen sker löpande, så tveka inte att höra av dig.


Bakgrundskontroller ingår i våra rekryteringsprocesser. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!


**Välkommen till Telia Cygate – Home of Experts**

title: Inköpschef
description:
*Consolis* *Strängbetong är* *ett av* *Sveriges ledande stombyggsföretag och vår vision är att skapa de vackraste, mest innovativa och hållbara samhällsmiljöerna i Sverige. Vi bygger allt från bostäder och kontor till parkeringshus, hallar och arenor.*  

  

*Consolis* *Strängbetong har idag* *sex* *produktionsenheter och elva kontor runtom i Sverige. Med sina* *700**medarbetare har Strängbetong en årlig produktion om ca* *4**00 000 ton betongelement och omsätter ca 2 miljarder* *SEK**. Huvudkontoret finns i Stockholm.*

*Consolis Strängbetong ingår i Consolis som sysselsätter cirka 7 500 personer på 17 marknader över hela världen. Koncernen genererade 1 miljard euro i försäljning under 2023.*


*L**äs mer på www.strangbetong.se**samt www.consolis.com.*

  



Till Consolis Strängbetong söker vi nu en


**Inköp****s****chef**
----------------------



med placering i Solna alternativt på någon av våra producerande enheter

  


Är du intresserad av en bred inköpschefsroll med fokus på ledarskap, strategi, operativt arbete och digitalisering? Lockas du av att komma till ett bolag där det händer mycket och där du har en drivande roll i att effektivisera och utveckla inköpsprocessen? Då ska du definitivt söka rollen som Inköpschef på Strängbetong!  

  

Consolis Strängbetong arbetar målmedvetet för att leda den hållbara omställningen inom byggmaterial industrin och byggindustrin. Vår högsta prioritet är att minska miljöpåverkan från våra produkter och vår produktion. Vi har inlett flera hållbarhetsfokuserade aktiviteter som alla syftar till att uppnå klimatneutralitet. Vi är fast beslutna att inte bara vara Sveriges ledande leverantör av prefabricerade betongkonstruktioner utan också branschens föregångare på resan mot klimatneutralitet.

  




**Inköpschefens roll**



I rollen som Inköpschef kommer du att ansvara för och leda ett team om fyra medarbetare. Teamet ansvarar för strategiskt inköp samt processen för operativa inköp i Strängbetong, fördelat på projekt och fabrik. Som person drivs du av kostnadseffektiva inköp som resulterar i lägsta totalkostnad samtidigt som vi driver hållbarhetsarbetet mot klimatneutralitet.

  

Du kommer att leda inköpsavdelningen och rapportera till CFO och samtidigt arbeta tillsammans med koncernens inköpsorganisation. Du kommer att arbeta nära linjen och ditt team men även ha mycket kontakt med juridik, redovisning, controlling och IT. Det är en bred roll där operativt arbete kombineras med ledarskap och rollen passar dig som förstår och är intresserad av kopplingen mellan linjen och inköp.

  


Viss flexibilitet finns avseende placering såsom på huvudkontoret i Solna alternativt kontor där Consolis Strängbetong har produktion.

  




**Inköpschefens arbetsuppgifter**



Som Inköpschef kommer du arbeta brett, både operativt och strategiskt, och dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter kommer att vara:


Teamledning: Ledning och utveckling av inköpsteamet som består av fyra medarbetare, för att säkerställa effektivitet och prestation  

* 

Inköpsstrategi: Sätta upp, utveckla och genomföra effektiva inköpsstrategier som är i linje med företagets mål och behov  
* 

Mål: Ansvarig för att sätta mål för avdelningen och teammedlemmarna samt för kontinuerligt styrning och uppföljning av dessa  
* 

Råmaterial: Hantera riskanalyser och strategiska utmaningar i vardagen som har en stark koppling till anskaffning av råmaterial och tjänster  
* 

Leverantörsrelationer: Övergripande ansvar för att hantera nuvarande ramavtal och nya leverantörsrelationer, förhandla avtal, villkor och priser  
* 

Inköpsprocessen: Ansvar för verksamhetens operativa och strategiska inköpsprocess och att den är uppdaterad i företagets ledningssystem. Och se till att hela verksamheten arbetar efter den  
* 

Systemansvar: Ansvar för verksamhetens operativa inköpssystem med samtliga behovsartiklar, avtal, priser, rutiner, användarsupport och utbildningar. I september 2024 kommer vårt nuvarande inköpssystem Coupa att ersättas av inköpsmodulen i IFS Cloud vilket innebär en större förändring.  
* 

Avtal/Villkor: Ansvar för att verksamheten hela tiden arbetar med relevanta uppdaterade avtalsmallar och vid var tid gällande villkor och sanktionsregler  
* 

Samarbete/stöd: Rollen innebär ett nära samarbete och stöd till samtliga avdelningar och ansvar för att stötta med upphandlingskompetens i lokala/regionala upphandlingar  
* 
* Revisioner: Ansvarig vid genomförande av inköpsavdelningens interna och externa revisioner
  


Operativa delar: Eget stort kategoriansvar/leverantörsansvar/strategi, och dessutom med roll i inköpssystemet som hantering av upplägg av nya leverantörer och attester vid inköp inom kategoriansvaret inklusive:


Sanktionshantering/leverantörsuppföljning nya och existerande leverantörer och kunder  

* 

Arbete med lagernivåer på fabriker och rapportering/förbättringsarbete kring detta  
* 
* Arbete med kassaflöde i relation till våra leverantörer och hantering av detta

Arbete med rapportering av kostnadsutveckling inom inköpskategorierna  
* 
* Arbete med uppdatering av ramavtalsdatabas kontinuerligt, samt information och uppdateringar kring inköp och leverantörer på intranätet

  


**Din profil**

Vi söker dig som har en relevant högskoleutbildning i kombination med minst 10 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med inköp till projekt och fabrik, och är en van förhandlare. Erfarenhet av ledarskap är ett önskemål och naturligtvis har du ett gediget intresse för teamet. Erfarenhet från entreprenad- och fabriksverksamhet är meriterande. Vidare har du ett intresse för system och ser systemstöd som det självklara verktyget för att effektivisera och förbättra ditt arbete.

  

**Du som person**

  


För att trivas i den här tjänsten som Inköpschef ser vi att du är en person som ser till att saker och ting blir gjorda samt tar ett tydligt ägarskap, kan fördela arbetsuppgifter och är intresserad av ledarskap. Att leverera med kvalitet är en självklarhet för dig och du ser till att ha en god struktur i ditt arbete.

  


Då tjänsten bygger på samarbete med såväl kollegor inom teamet som med andra avdelningar, fäster vi stor vikt vid din kommunikativa förmåga och att du har lätt för att skapa förtroende. Vidare trivs du med att arbeta i en omväxlande och föränderlig miljö och har ett ledarskapsfokus där du motiveras av att stötta och utveckla dina kollegor.

  


**Ansök** så snart som möjligt! Urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan den planerade sista ansökningsdagen 2024-06-23. Ansöker gör du här på sidan.

  


**Vid frågor** kontakta CFO Peter Lundström på e-postadress peter.lundstrom@strangbetong.se eller telefon +46-733059605. Frågor kan även ställas till Thomas Barsawme som är Head of Global SCM inom Consoliskoncernen; thomas.barsawme@consolis.com eller +46-70-2213320.

  



Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: SAP PP Application Consultant
description:
**Application consultant (SAP PP, Stockholm)**
----------------------------------------------

**Join our expanding** **Nordic SAP** **team and help leading organizations unlock the value of technology. Capgemini is seeking an experienced Senior SAP PP Consultant to join our dynamic team.**  

  

**YOUR ROLE**

* **The ideal candidate will have a strong background in SAP Production Planning, with a proven track record of successful implementations and optimizations. As a Senior SAP PP Consultant, you will play a key role in providing expert guidance, driving process improvements, and ensuring the successful delivery of SAP PP solutions.**
* **In this role you will play a key role in:**
* **Leading SAP PP implementation projects, including gathering requirements, designing solutions, and overseeing the execution of the project plan**
* **Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business processes and providing SAP PP expertise to meet business objectives**
* **Configuring and customizing SAP PP modules to address specific business needs and enhancing overall system performance**
* **Providing training and supporting to end-users, ensuring a smooth transition to new SAP PP functionalities**
* **Conducting regular system assessments, identifying areas for improvement, and implementing solutions to optimize SAP PP processes**
* **Staying current with SAP best practices and industry trends to provide recommendations for continuous improvement**
**YOUR PROFILE**
----------------

* **Bachelor's degree in a relevant field**
* **Proven experience as an SAP PP Consultant, with at least 5 years of hands-on experience**
* **In-depth knowledge of SAP PP module functionality and integration with other SAP modules**
* **Strong understanding of production planning processes and industry best practices**
* **Experience in both SAP PP implementation and support projects**
* **Experience in a minimum of one S/4 transformation**
* **Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders at all levels**

  

**WHAT YOU’LL LOVE ABOUT WORKING HERE**

* **A challenging career in a vibrant environment with access to extensive training and a global network of experts**
* **Opportunities to work on real-world problems and help transform leading organizations**
* **A company culture driven by core values: Honesty, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, Modesty, Fun, and Boldness**
* **A strong commitment to inclusion, diversity, and supporting the whole person**
* **An innovative culture that promotes learning, growth, and shared success**

  

**Apply Now and Transform Your Career with Capgemini.**  

  

**About Capgemini**  

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world while creating a tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market-leading capabilities in AI, cloud, and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**  

  

**Get The Future You Want |** **www.capgemini.com**
company_description: Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology.

title: Business Analyst – Talent Management Data Strategy \u007C SEB
description:
As we journey through data, we need a Business Analyst to fuel our analytics roadmap. Join us, share your knowledge, and shape our strategic data initiatives.
As a part of the SEB Group, we provide world-class financial services to support SEB on the journey of becoming the leader in efficiency and innovation. Our dedicated team of over 2800 employees consistently strive to enhance business development and growth. If you want to be part of an engaging and enabling environment where you can turn your everyday actions into global results, this is where you get to shine.

What you will be doing  

As a Business Analyst in SEB, you will be a key driver of the data & analytics strategy in HR, Talent Management, by leading global report developments, support the team, and deep dive our data to improve its quality. In general, you will also contribute to holistic data projects and share your expertise to shape SEB's data landscape by taking an active role in the Center of Excellence for the HR data strategy. Grow your career in our dynamic environment, making an impact with your analytical skills and insights.
### **As a Business Analyst you will be responsible for:**

* Drive data and analytics initiatives in collaboration with specialists.
* Lead and coordinate report development within the Talent Management department
* Independently create reports and perform in-depth data analysis.
* Propose process improvements and innovative solutions.
* Manage access structures and reporting tool setup.
* Participate in data-related projects and provide training to the team.

### **To thrive in this role, we believe you have:**

* Experience in data analysis or a related field.
* Proficiency in report development and data analysis tools (Tableau, PowerBI, , etc.)
* Strong decision-making skills and ability to drive change.
* Excellent communication and training abilities.
* Experience with stakeholder management and networking.
* Some knowledge of data lakes and cloud platforms (e.g., Google Cloud) is a plus.
* Experience working as part of an Agile team and understanding of Agile practices and tools.

### **What we offer:**

* **Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment:** work-life balance, hybrid way of working, international working environment, empowering culture. Friendly and welcoming teammates, top-class client network and projects or other.
* **Growth culture:** extensive training and learning opportunities, additional learning platforms, local and international internal mobility possibilities, long-term stability. Learn to deliver world-class service to customers, possibility to help transform an industry, and put an impact on social or environmental issues or other.
* **Modern environment:** innovative company in forefront of technology, challenging, cutting-edge work, excellent office environment, agile and modern ways of working.
* **Additional monetary benefits:** paid seniority vacation and volunteering days, allocations to Your pension fund, profit sharing programme, and additional health insurance.

**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.  

Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application containing your CV and personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute today, but no later than 2024-05-20. Should you have any questions regarding the position you can reach out to Anders Resar at anders.resar@seb.se  

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** www.sebgroup.com/career
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Engineering Manager - Brands of Leo
description:
As an Engineering Manager in the Brands of Leo department you will work and lead a talented team of developers based in the Stockholm, Newcastle and Malaga office to create innovative and high performing web and mobile apps for a range of LeoVegas’ brands such as BetMGM, BetUK and Expekt.
  
You will have a mobile first approach to development, with an understanding of software development.
  
  

**YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:**  

Delivering the Design, build, and maintenance of scalable, secure, and efficient solutions within your team
  
Optimising resource utilisation, enhancing performance, and ensuring reliability across cloud platforms
  
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive innovation and streamline processes
  
Improve and maintain the applications with a product focus
  
Contribute to launching new brands and brand expansions into new territories
  
  

**OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE:****Essential skills:**  

Solid engineering background, spending at least 5+ years working as an engineer.
  
Strong people management and leadership skills with at least 3+ years of managing a team.
  
Experience in leading and developing people and teams through goals, inspiration, transparency and trust.
  
Demonstrated experience in leading, coaching and mentoring agile software development teams.
  
  

**Nice to have skills:**  

Experience from the iGamingExperience with React Native
  
  

WHO ARE WE?
  
At the core of LeoVegas Group, is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1400 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 11 offices world-wide.
  
  

BENEFITS
  
Hybrid work policy
  
4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
  
30 annual vacation days
  
Occupational Pension
  
5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
  
Parental Leave Top-Up
  
Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
  
1,500 SEK equipment allowance
  
Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
  
We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.
  
  

JOIN US!
  
In our pride, we like to empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait around for things to happen, we pounce and make it happen!
  
If you think you would be a good fit for the Leo pride - give us a roar!

title: Domain Architect - Retention
description:
You will work with your team & the Product Development Domain to focus on developing and and maintaining innovative and high performing features with cloud technologies and high throughput transactional systems that will give our players the greatest gaming experience, helping us reach our bigger organization passion of creating “The greatest iGaming experience” and keep us at the forefront of mobile gaming.
  
  

A Domain Architect is a combined senior developer and architect role that with a hands-on approach governs the technical and functional development within a specific subsystem. We do expect you to write code and guide the developers in the domain to ensure that our Platform and Product meet the requirements and are future-proof.
  
  

**YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:**  

* We see that you have experience in leading other engineers and the ability to understand the overall picture. Communicating complex technical challenges for non-technical stakeholders.
* Ensuring that the subsystem maintains an overall technical architecture that is robust, scalable and efficient
* Represent the subsystem in technical discussions and solution designs with architect peers and stakeholders
* Educating developers in best practices and architecture principles
* Reviewing developers work and provide relevant feedback


**OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:**  

ESSENTIAL SKILLS
  
* Minimum of 2+ years of working as an architect
* Experience of Docker & Kubernetes
* Experience with messaging tools (i.e. Kafka)
* Experience with microservice architecture
* Experience in mentoring other developers
* We strongly believe that you are a person who has a good understanding of architectural principles in scalable, highly concurrent, and fault-tolerant enterprise systems


NICE TO HAVES
  
* Fullstack experience
* Clear Communication - being able to adapt depending on who you have in front of you
* Mentoring skills
* Solution oriented
* Experience with event-driven architecture


WHO WE ARE
  
  

At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1400 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 11 offices worldwide.
  
  

BENEFITS
  
  

* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enrol in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


JOIN US!
  
In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!
  
  

Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!
